GeneralInformation.History: Founded as University of Applied Sciences.
Founded 1993 as Hadhramout University of Science and Technology
Founded 1996. Originally known as the Faculty of Education (established 1986 and affiliated to Sana'a University).

GeneralInformation.History: Opened in 2006 as a campus of Lebanese International University

AdmissionRequirements: Admission test passed with scores of 85% for Medical and Dental Faculties; 80% for Faculty of Engineering and Computer Sciences; 75% for Faculties of Education; score 70% for all other Faculties

AdmissionRequirements: First university degree with general average 'good' for Master’s  programmes; Master degree with general average 'good' for PhD programmes

GeneralInformation.History: Founded 1975 incorporating faculties founded between 1970 and 1973.
